name: Cosmo's
address: 726 E Tremont Ave, Bronx, NY 10457, USA

reviews.text: Old school old style coffee shop with take out/ counter & booth seating breafast lunch and dinner very good dining for the area they make "egg salad by scratch" made to order and they have also have "Grits"
Great man size breakfasts very tasty and sweet old lady serving us was great
Well I order greets  and they weren't  good  they taste nasty  and some of the staff don't understand  customers  orders

Local hole-in-the-wall, have been going to eat here for some 30+ years. The business is run by a very nice family.  The service is quick, the food is good, the  coffee is eye opening & all reasonably priced. They do accept credit/debit cards now.
I have a nostalgic feeling for this spot. I used to bring my boys here back in the 90‚Äôs. The food is still okay and the service is impeccable. They gotta work on the flies thoü´¢üíï
Amazing spot. My moms been coming here for a long time
Great food and bacon very crispy the way I love it and home fries delicious
It been there for 30byear
I ordered  to be delivered, the food was good . The delivery guys are very nice .
Good food and service
Very Good in Food Service and Atmosphere‚ù£Ô∏è
Ordered breakfast twice. The restaurant vibe fits in well for the neighborhood.  It was crowded and very busy at 1230pm. I ordered food and picked it up
Amazing loyal customer of Cozmos for many years.

Food was not good at all‚Ä¶ everything is frozen‚Ä¶ cooks don‚Äôt even cook anymore
People make better quality food at home
Will never return to this place again
They are not what they used to be‚Ä¶
Definitely low standards and no love of food or cooking
Hay dias muy lleno pero vale la pena esperar los desayunos muy ricos ü´†
Food is below mediocre. Nothing special. While eating, roaches try to join in. Place is run down. Worn out chairs, poor lighting, burnt food. No quality, no love.
I've been going to this restaurant for over 30 years and I love their breakfast, their home fries are delicious
Love this place. Been going here for about 20yrs now...
I got the meatloaf and I enjoyed it I add my own dressing to this and was so good the gravy is banging!
Food is always  fresh
This is my go to spot, I just feel so comfortable and the waitress already knows what I start off with (‚òï,glass ü•Ç of water) The food hits the spot in a good way and the service is awesome üëç.
Loved this place since I was younger. Great service.
Great
Mal servicio üíî le faltaba mayonesa a la hamburguesaü•≤ nos atendieron de mala ganas

The food was very dry and service was bad. When we asked for what they had forgotten to bring we were given nasty faces and an attitude. We were also billed right as we sat to eat. Do not recommend the food is not good, burgers are very dry and unseasoned.
El lugar es muy bueno el servicio bueno los trabajadores muy amable
Fast service.  Love their meatloaf

Hands down, the best grilled chicken sandwich I had in a very long time

In a world of fried chicken sandwiches, it's rare to find a grilled chicken this simple and affordable, but still delicious

Their breakfast looks delicious, too

I have a new born & one toddler. I called order my food and the delivery guy took long with the food & didn't bring it to me left it downstairs.  I'm letting everyone I come in contact with that wants to order from there & tell them DONT DO IT!!!!!  Mind you it's their personal delivery people üôÑ‚Ä¶
The food was great! Coffee delicious. The lady did all the tables and held the table for us while we wait at the stools. First time and I will come again ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
I called to place an order of home fires with extra peppers and onions üßÖ with bacon and eggs and my home fries have no taste , no peppers or onions I asked for and it‚Äôs soooooo oily very nasty.
I order the Bingen waffle with chicken fingers and when I say something good üëç
Lo mejor

I like how it's a diner with counter and booths, the food is good, prices reasonable, always clean. I did take off a star because their personalities could be friendlier, no one says good morning or afternoon, hardly ANYONE smiles, there's no greeting you which would be nice to be acknowledged when you are there.
Love this restaurant
Great service

Ordered for deliver but order never arrived, took a hour and twenty minutes till I decided to pick up the order when I arrive to the diner, the lady said the order was never placed when clearly I spoke to someone at the diner. Feel like the lady‚Äôs working Infront don‚Äôt care about customers service. Also one time I order an order of pancakes and a plain omelet and they forget the omelet.
They allow the homeless to panhandle in the business. I mean you can be sitting down eating and they'll allow the homeless to come right up to your table panhandling and they don't say anything.
Great food, top shelf customer service!!
This place is great. Great service, good value on lunch and tasty food
Enjoy eating the food very clean place we eat there again
The people here are friendly and the food is good too.
The Food is always good  the place itself is very small and outdated. The prices are a little on the high side  and it is  cash only
My local breakfast spot been coming here for years!
The food was good, i only gave 4 stars because my bagel wasn't toasted hard as requested. But I would return.

My family and I have brunch dates often and we frequent Cosmos! The food is excellent and fresh. The service is swift and friendly, the prices are extremely fair, and the made to order fresh squeezed pink lemonade is paradise in a cup!!!

Great service and even better food. Everything from home fries, sausage to waffles are soooo good. The only thing i don't like is the French toast not because of the taste but because i just wish they would use thick slices of Bragg rather‚Ä¶
I've been coming here for years the food and staff are really good. There coffee is always a must have.
Warm, friendly, and great service. I got my usual the staff already knows exactly what I want.

I love their breakfast. They give you a good amount of food and is very affordable.  It's clean and they cook where you can see them preparing your food.  The waffles, home fries, and the oatmeal are better than any restaurant in NYC.

My sister and I ordered some food to go and it was amazing and on time. The chicken tenders were tasty and tender. The onion rings were great and my sister fell in love with the grilled chicken sandwich.

I would definitely recommend.

Attentive and humble staffüòç

My favorite place for breakfast and its affordable.Its small and cozy. The service is great. Everything on the menu is delicious. My regular order is the steak and eggs with onion... yummy . It normally comes with homefries which I don"t eat due to personal diet preference.

üëç
Nice service by Elena and another young lady. Food came fast. Good breakfast.
I later added grits to my order but Elena came back and said 'no more'.
A few minutes later she came with a cup of grits. Sweet looking out.

üëé
More convenient if they'd accept debit/credit cards.
Background music stressful, something more smooth for a Saturday morning.

Overall: üåüüåüüåüüåü

This place is amazing! I just found this gem and have came in twice days apart. Quality is on point, customer service is amazing. I will definitely be coming here as a go to for breakfast. Love it ! MAKE SURE YOU TIP THIS AWESOME TEAM! THEY DESERVE/EARNED IT.

The food here is ALWAYS good. Well cooked meet. I always enjoy the breakfast and the gyros. Even after I moved out of state I come often and always eat here. Love it here and the staff are exceptional üëè‚Ä¶

I have been going here for more than 30yrs.
The food is very good. The service is fast.
The place is small and because its the best place to eat breakfast its always packed in the mornings. My favorite place to eat my breakfast! !
One of the best breakfast diner in the Bronx. Their home fries are great & everything else. The service is fast the employees are wonderful & the prices are reasonable.

Cosmos is the #1 breakfast spot in the Bronx Tremont area. Their breakfast specials are very inexpensive and you definitely get a lot of food for your buck. The home fries are a must have . The staff is friendly and so attentive it‚Äôs like home away from home when eating here. Everything is great about this place so go visit whenever in the area.

0 stars today I ordered a meal at 1000 am I called multiple times no answer then at 1145 am I recieved a call delivery I politely say I have a broken leg I cannot come downstairs. I also have a vehicle if I was able to move I would have got‚Ä¶

The food is amazing. Fast delivery and they come up to your door! Only downside is that they never have menus I wish they would put it online at least!!!
EDIT:: A year later they have menus. Happy ordering folks!!!
Customer service here is great. Place is always clean and the food is great. And you don't have to wait too long to get your food.

I had to come back and edit this because I absolutely love this restaurant they're so clean and polite the food is always on point I'm very particular about what and where I eat but I can honestly say they are amazing their competitor is no‚Ä¶

This diner loves the COPS but hates its neighbors. They refuse to deliver in my neighborhood because the delivery boys get harassed and or robbed. My neighborhood became the safest around Tremont because NYPD felt the need to install‚Ä¶
Ive coming to this place over 30 years. Food always good n pleasant. I used to go with my kids now their taking me.
Love to start my day at Cosmos on E. Tremont whenever I'm in the Bronx! Good food! Good service! Good Staff! Nice waitresses! We had "Gennifer" today! "Very sweet!"
Good fast fresh I've only had their breakfast but I'm sure the same effort is put in all other dishes prepared there

Go to diner spot for years! I can recall the sunday mornings where we would order cosmos religiously. The food is well made and hearty, they're very generous with the portions. Hope this mom & pop diner sticks around for more years to come.
This family run restaurant is awesome.  The food is tasty and plentiful.  This is the only place in NY that we were served a wine glass filled to the top, and it was great wine.
The food & service here is AWESOME, they have a really great selection to choose from
Great place to dine. Been coming here for many years. Staff are wonderful and respectful. Food is great. No complains.
This is the community breakfast spot. Customers are always willing wait for a table to be available to eat.  Food is great and the service is pleasant.  The wait time is not long as well.
